quote_first: I woke to the dogs barking. I heard a door slam, and the sound of him moving into the kitchen. The fire had died out, the new wood unburned, but the lamp was still on. I peered at my watch; it was
quote_last: I felt cold and nauseous. I got up and smoothed my hair. I nudged Karen with a toe; she blinked awake.
title: The Body Lies
author: Jo Baker
